title: Englands vievv, in the vnmasking of two paradoxes with a replication vnto the answer of Maister Iohn Bodine. By Gerrard de Malynes Merchant.
author: Malynes, Gerard, fl. 1586-1641.
notes: A reply to Jean Bodin's response to the Paradoxes of Malestroict.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
